comments: Great ultra-shounen story. The MC was OP-ish, but didnt know hw to control his poewr. Midoriya shounen. Story continues

title: Mayoiga
comments: Nice storyline, similar to the tv series LOST

title: Joker Game
comments: AMazing storyline, great morals, over all great art and great seinen mystery spying story.

title: Sakamoto desu ga
comments: Funny shounen/comedy storyline about a all too perfect highschool student.

title: Alice in Borderland
comments: Great storyline of 3 episodes, a sad yet amazing storyline. Top 3 supporting characters die at the end.

title: ReLife
comments: Amazing and somewhat sand story about a middle aged guy turning into a highschooler. Slice of life. story does not conclude.

title: Kara no Kyoukai 1: Fukan Fuukei
comments: amazing story

title: Arve Rezzle
comments: Interesting one episode short. Sci-fi. Cliche. Story is not deep, MC is a siscon.

title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
comments: Natsuki Subari. THe epitome of human bravery. Best anime of 2016. Possibly better than SAO

title: handa kun
comments: comedy anime about a super popular guy named handa who never realises, in fact he misunderstands the situation to be everyone hating him.

title: 91 Days
comments: Freaking amazing storyline based on real events. Very unexpected ending. Avilio dies

title: Shelter
comments: Its a very deep short-film about a girl who is sent to space for survival by her 'father?'

title: Mob Psycho 100
comments: got exciting at times.

title: Ajin: Shoutotsu
comments: Amazing continuation of the story, and further developement of Nagai's character.

title: Occultic;Nine
comments: Amazing planning and good story.
Great continuation of the amazing anime series of pure badass. The animation was done poorly sometimes. 3D animation ust be mastered

title: Haikyuu!!: Karasuno Koukou VS Shiratorizawa Gakuen Koukou
comments: Great story as expected, the entire series was basically one match

title: Gantz
comments: Seinen anime with a serious attitude towards death/gore. Cool stuff. Lots of gore, some nudity

title: Gantz second stage
comments: good stuff

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
comments: Wow. Amazing storyline and characters. Managed to make 26ep live up to it's former glory. Badass MC.

title: Kimi no Na Wa
comments: Amazing gripping storyline, had me no the edge of my chair for the best parts. Great storyline, and Ending Mitsuha x Taki

title: Detroit Metal City
comments: Comedic value > 9000. Similar to Daily Lives of Highschool Students. Great 15 mins shorts.

title: Ao no Exorcist: Kyoto Fujouou-hen
comments: Shorter than the last, still great story. Rin saves the day once more. Mephisto is planning something.

title: Masamune-kun no Revenge
comments: Storyline similar to Nisekoi, the characters as well. This story is inconclusive. Aki Adagake, Masamune Makabe

title: Koe no Katachi
comments: Great stuff. Very relatable to the MC

title: Shingeki no Kyojin 2
comments: Amazing continuation, excellent direction.

title: Blame! Movie
comments: Amazing art style, and sci-fi concepts. Great badass MC

title: Patema Inverted
comments: Pretty cool. Very nice music, and storyline.

title: Kakegurui
comments: Amazing storyline, and concept of a gamling highschool. The MC is a bystander. Story did not close, might be second season.

title: Tsurezure Children
comments: Romance comedy shorts finished in 1 day. half length episodes. Good

title: Boku no Hero Academia 2
comments: Great second season, amazing storyline kept on staying interesting throughout the 25 episode season.

title: Evil or Live
comments: Badass character, excellent character development. The story is shallow and short, not completed.

title: Inuyashiki
comments: Really good story, and characters. The protagonist + antagonist combination was unique and played out very well.

title: Juuni Taisen
comments: Really deep and dark storyline. Similar to the Fate series. Battle royale, weakest guy wins.

title: Godzilla: Kaijuu Wakusei
comments: Really good storyline, great voice acting. Unresolved ending, regardless very good movie

title: Just Because!
comments: i thought i would not like it, but the characters play along really well, and the love triangle is resolved to a line.

title: Gyakusatsu Kikan
comments: Very brutal and realistic seinen anime movie. really enforces the fact that anime is not just for children and weirdos

title: Initial D Movie: Legend 3 - Mugen
comments: Good stuff. Sad to see such a legendary series end. But all good things must end.

title: B: The Beginning
comments: Great story
Great story, made me cry at times. Would recommend a rewatch. Kakeruo Naruse, Naho

title: Kagewani
comments: Didn't like the art-style at first, but learned to like it. Excellent story, horrifying and satsifying at the same time. Banba-sensei

title: Dies Irae
comments: Interesting, but not interesting. Good seinen characteristics, but the executon is story is poor.

title: Classroom of the elite
comments: Really good story, cool badass silent mc. Not over.

title: Devilman: Crybaby
comments: Really good and brutal R+ rated story about the devil and a good buy. Sad ending
